about_the_game:
Siphonogore is a roguelike turn-based rpg mixed with a choose your own adventure game, where your choices and strategies matter.


  • Carefully Catered & Randomly Encountered Combat Challenges
  • Robust Choose Your Own Adventure Sections
  • Evolving Combat Strategies & Unlockable Adventuring Options
  • A Customizable Body with new unlockable parts


Siphonogore's Turn-Based combat challenges are designed to create fun, engaging, and unique encounters. Enemies are designed to act both together and independently, with a common specialized strategy you'll have to discover and play around.
After every combat encounter, the remains are consumed and turned into biomass, granting access to mutations: specializations, new moves, move modifications, stat upgrades, or modifications to enemy behavior.


You'll find yourself given a choice between points of interest to follow - your decision brings you to a Choose Your Own Adventure styled segment with branching paths and different outcomes. Though acting recklessly may increase the risk of getting hurt, well planned recklessness may provide rewards. Moves, mutations, and more add additional options and lines of action to these already broad pathways.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains scenes of fantasy gore, mutilation, and dismemberment
Contains written and visual depictions of violence

detailed_description:
Click the Discord link in the sidebar to join the community and get early previews of Updates!

name: Siphonogore

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: I'm building this on a 10 year old PC
  • Graphics: You'll probably be able to run it

short_description: Siphonogore is a Hemothematic Turn-Based Roguelike Dungeon Crawler. The world is meat; calloused and rotten. Within the hollow husk of a sleeping god a war rages for the source of its power. Control a cobbled together creature of obscure origin, a self-made successor, here to take what is yours.
